content.text: 0) In a saucepan, heat milk, brown sugar, butter, salt and cinnamon.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "heat"@18:22 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "milk"@23:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "brown sugar"@29:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "butter"@42:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salt"@50:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "cinnamon"@59:67 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a saucepan"@6:16 / TOOL )
	)
)

( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( "remaining ingredients"@7:28 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-5 )
			:ref ( ing-6 )
			:ref ( ing-7 )
			:ref ( ing-8 )
			:ref ( ing-9 )
		)
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "mix"@30:33 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 45 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Cover and bake"@3:17 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-3-0 "350 degrees F"@21:34 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "45 minutes"@39:49 / DUR )
	)
)
